Name: congenital central hypoventilation syndrome
Definition: An autonomic nervous system disease characterized by reduced responsiveness of the  respiratory center to carbon dioxide

Name: idiopathic peripheral autonomic neuropathy
Definition: A pericardial effusion that results from blood in the pericardial sac.

Name: obsolete vitamin A deficiency with conjunctival xerosis and Bitot's spot
Definition: A pericardial effusion that results from blood in the pericardial sac.
Synonym: vitamin A deficiency with Bitot's spot AND conjunctival xerosis [dup] (disorder)

Name: obsolete vitamin A deficiency with night blindness
Definition: A pericardial effusion that results from blood in the pericardial sac.
Synonym: vitamin A deficiency with night blindness (disorder)

Name: autonomic neuropathy
Definition: A pericardial effusion in which fluid accumulates in the pericardium (the sac in which the heart is enclosed) and the pericardial spaces fills up faster than the pericardial sac can stretch.

Name: Frey syndrome
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus

Name: complex regional pain syndrome
Definition: A spinal cord disease that is characterized by inflammation of the white matter or gray matter of the spinal cord.
